channel.title: Non existing item!
channel.description: well i got a blade called lava blade and on the atk menu it says NON existing item and it dont atk properly it is like a fist just atking u cant see sword when atking... so any ideas on how to fix it?

item.title: Non existing item!
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Yeah, what he said.

Read full topic

item.title: Non existing item!
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

No no no no…this is how to add your weapon:
First add it in item.cfg

item = 15337 Lava_blade       A_Blade        100000 100000 100000   99  99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99

Then you search in client.java:

public int GetWepAnim()

Then you add it with the 2h

[code] if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15337

    {
        return 407;
    }[/code]

Now search:

 public int GetWalkAnim

And add:

if (id == 15337) { return 2064; }
Next search:

public int GetStandAnim

Add:

if (id == 15337) // 2h { return 2065; }

So…now you can hit With the weapon.

Change nothing in Item.java
you only have to edit Item.java if you wanne add armor or hats
If your ID isn’t standing in Item.java you wear it in your weapon slot
So 15337 is a weapon so don’t add it in Item.java
You get what i mean?

The only thing u must edit is client.java
U must tell the server its an weapon.

Read full topic

item.title: Non existing item!
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

Well, the items that aren’t listed in the item.java by default go to the item slot, so it should work.
=\ sorry bud.

item.title: Non existing item!
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

Haha, okay thanks.
I was kind of more expecting a
[co de]
[/co de]
block to organize it more.
Try putting it in the twoHanded[] int.
If that doesn’t work, then I can’t help you =[
It may just not work with the client, although fist-punching is serverside.

EDIT:
Nono just Item.java, no need for the others.

Read full topic
